import React, { useState } from "react"; import { ProgressBar, Button, Card, Form, Toast } from "react-bootstrap"; const PostProject = () => { // sets values of properties const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [visibility, setVisibility] = useState(""); // sets display of all the slides const [slideDisplays, setSlideDisplays] = useState([ { display: true }, { display: false }, { display: false }, { display: false } ]); const handleSetSlideDisplays = (hide, show) => { const newSlideDisplays = { ...slideDisplays }; newSlideDisplays[hide].display = false; newSlideDisplays[show].display = true; setSlideDisplays(newSlideDisplays); }; const handleSubmit = () => { window.open("/", "_self"); }; return (
Bootstrap just now See? Just like this. Bootstrap 2 seconds ago Heads up, toasts will stack automatically

); }; export default PostProject;
